And the whole earth<S>776</S> was of one<S>259</S> language<S>8193</S>, and of one<S>259</S> speech<S>1697</S>. <sup>language: Heb. lip.</sup> <sup>speech: Heb. words</sup>
And it came to pass, as they journeyed<S>5265</S> from the east<S>6924</S>, that they found<S>4672</S> a plain<S>1237</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Shinar<S>8152</S>; and they dwelt<S>3427</S> there. <sup>from: or, eastward</sup>
And they said<S>559</S> one<S>376</S> to another<S>7453</S>, Go to<S>3051</S>, let us make<S>3835</S> brick<S>3843</S>, and burn<S>8313</S> them throughly<S>8316</S>. And they had brick<S>3843</S> for stone<S>68</S>, and slime<S>2564</S> had<S>1961</S> they for morter<S>2563</S>. <sup>they said: Heb. a man said to his neighbour</sup> <sup>burn: Heb. burn them to a burning</sup>
And they said<S>559</S>, Go to<S>3051</S>, let us build<S>1129</S> us a city<S>5892</S> and a tower<S>4026</S>, whose top<S>7218</S> may reach unto heaven<S>8064</S>; and let us make<S>6213</S> us a name<S>8034</S>, lest we be scattered abroad<S>6327</S> upon the face<S>6440</S> of the whole earth<S>776</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> came down<S>3381</S> to see<S>7200</S> the city<S>5892</S> and the tower<S>4026</S>, which the children<S>1121</S> of men<S>120</S> builded<S>1129</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> said<S>559</S>, Behold, the people<S>5971</S> is one<S>259</S>, and they have all one<S>259</S> language<S>8193</S>; and this they begin<S>2490</S> to do<S>6213</S>: and now nothing<S>3808</S> <S>3605</S> will be restrained<S>1219</S> from them, which they have imagined<S>2161</S> to do<S>6213</S>.
Go to<S>3051</S>, let us go down<S>3381</S>, and there confound<S>1101</S> their language<S>8193</S>, that<S>834</S> they may not understand<S>8085</S> one<S>376</S> another's<S>7453</S> speech<S>8193</S>.
So the LORD<S>3068</S> scattered them abroad<S>6327</S> from thence<S>8033</S> upon the face<S>6440</S> of all the earth<S>776</S>: and they left off<S>2308</S> to build<S>1129</S> the city<S>5892</S>.
Therefore is the name of it<S>8034</S> called<S>7121</S> Babel<S>894</S>; because the LORD<S>3068</S> did there confound<S>1101</S> the language<S>8193</S> of all the earth<S>776</S>: and from thence did<S>6327</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> scatter them abroad<S>6327</S> upon the face<S>6440</S> of all the earth<S>776</S>. <sup>Babel: that is, Confusion</sup>
These are the generations<S>8435</S> of Shem<S>8035</S>: Shem<S>8035</S> was an hundred<S>3967</S> years<S>8141</S> old<S>1121</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Arphaxad<S>775</S> two years<S>8141</S> after<S>310</S> the flood<S>3999</S>:
And Shem<S>8035</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Arphaxad<S>775</S> five<S>2568</S> hundred<S>3967</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>.
And Arphaxad<S>775</S> lived<S>2425</S> five<S>2568</S> and thirty<S>7970</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Salah<S>7974</S>:
And Arphaxad<S>775</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Salah<S>7974</S> four<S>702</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and three<S>7969</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>.
And Salah<S>7974</S> lived<S>2425</S> thirty<S>7970</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Eber<S>5677</S>:
And Salah<S>7974</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Eber<S>5677</S> four<S>702</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and three<S>7969</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>.
And Eber<S>5677</S> lived<S>2421</S> four<S>702</S> and thirty<S>7970</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Peleg<S>6389</S>: <sup>Peleg: Gr. Phalec</sup>
And Eber<S>5677</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Peleg<S>6389</S> four<S>702</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and thirty<S>7970</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>.
And Peleg<S>6389</S> lived<S>2421</S> thirty<S>7970</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Reu<S>7466</S>:
And Peleg<S>6389</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Reu<S>7466</S> two hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and nine<S>8672</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>.
And Reu<S>7466</S> lived<S>2421</S> two<S>8147</S> and thirty<S>7970</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Serug<S>8286</S>: <sup>Serug: Gr. Saruch</sup>
And Reu<S>7466</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Serug<S>8286</S> two hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and seven<S>7651</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>.
And Serug<S>8286</S> lived<S>2421</S> thirty<S>7970</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Nahor<S>5152</S>:
And Serug<S>8286</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Nahor<S>5152</S> two hundred<S>3967</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>.
And Nahor<S>5152</S> lived<S>2421</S> nine<S>8672</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Terah<S>8646</S>: <sup>Terah: Gr. Thara</sup>
And Nahor<S>5152</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Terah<S>8646</S> an hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and nineteen<S>6240</S> <S>8672</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>.
And Terah<S>8646</S> lived<S>2421</S> seventy<S>7657</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Abram<S>87</S>, Nahor<S>5152</S>, and Haran<S>2039</S>.
Now these are the generations<S>8435</S> of Terah<S>8646</S>: Terah<S>8646</S> begat<S>3205</S> Abram<S>87</S>, Nahor<S>5152</S>, and Haran<S>2039</S>; and Haran<S>2039</S> begat<S>3205</S> Lot<S>3876</S>.
And Haran<S>2039</S> died<S>4191</S> before<S>6440</S> his father<S>1</S> Terah<S>8646</S> in the land<S>776</S> of his nativity<S>4138</S>, in Ur<S>218</S> of the Chaldees<S>3778</S>.
And Abram<S>87</S> and Nahor<S>5152</S> took<S>3947</S> them wives<S>802</S>: the name<S>8034</S> of Abram's<S>87</S> wife<S>802</S> was Sarai<S>8297</S>; and the name<S>8034</S> of Nahor's<S>5152</S> wife<S>802</S>, Milcah<S>4435</S>, the daughter<S>1323</S> of Haran<S>2039</S>, the father<S>1</S> of Milcah<S>4435</S>, and the father<S>1</S> of Iscah<S>3252</S>.
But Sarai<S>8297</S> was barren<S>6135</S>; she had no child<S>2056</S>.
And Terah<S>8646</S> took<S>3947</S> Abram<S>87</S> his son<S>1121</S>, and Lot<S>3876</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Haran<S>2039</S> his son's<S>1121</S> son<S>1121</S>, and Sarai<S>8297</S> his daughter in law<S>3618</S>, his son<S>1121</S> Abram's<S>87</S> wife<S>802</S>; and they went forth<S>3318</S> with them from Ur<S>218</S> of the Chaldees<S>3778</S>, to go<S>3212</S> into the land<S>776</S> of Canaan<S>3667</S>; and they came<S>935</S> unto Haran<S>2771</S>, and dwelt<S>3427</S> there.
And the days<S>3117</S> of Terah<S>8646</S> were two hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and five<S>2568</S> years<S>8141</S>: and Terah<S>8646</S> died<S>4191</S> in Haran<S>2771</S>.
